issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJ1OkL5YMj8](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DeJ1OkL5YMj8) ### Comment > This fault is 100% repeatable on this iMc 18,3 and OS. > > I run the OS because it is the last Apple OS which runs 32-bit code. > > Whenever Youtube is loaded, I almost always see a 'Connect to Internet / Retry' page. The Retry button does not work, and I have to use the Reload button for the page. > > After reloading, the desired ad-sponsored video will often show a black screen with the loading circle, and the Comments section is white with a loading circle. This continues indefinitely. The only way to play the video is to turn off AdGuard and reload. > > On other occasions, the video Comments load, but the video frame is black with a countdown timer for partially suppressed ads. No ad audio is heard. After the Google-generated `Skip Ads' button becomes visible, the video will play normally. > > Only videos without superimposed ads play properly, but this is usually after having to reload the page. > > These bugs still persist after a complete system shutdown and reboot. And they still occur after Adguard has been deleted and then re-installed. Username: `@g0mrb` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/3a0usme5zkis84oc8g04sog004cwss4q3ob192ck5c.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ixgrw5hssp44wos4owccws4g4g0w400ggmqwpri4wg.png?nc=1)

```
Also should work.

comment.body:
@lionnesquaer На Дроиде не повторяется.
Наблюдаю такие варианты на разных девайсах:

<details>
<summary>Details</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/0909e76e-6a9a-4d9a-8589-5d9c6026fb68)

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/8361299/18bfd63c-9a47-47c7-93c4-d307c4d549d6)

</details>

На десктопе повторяется изредка, но не вижу зависимости от правил - одни и те же срабатывают когда в меню несколько пунктов (3-5) и когда лишь один.

В инспекторе скрытых пунктов меню тоже не вижу, правил для их удаления у нас нет

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.3 Nightly 18

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modyolo.com and https://apkmody.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, Web Annoyances Ultralist, I don't care about cookies

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

issue.title: Infinite "connection checking" loading

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.3 Nightly 18

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modyolo.com and https://apkmody.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, Web Annoyances Ultralist, I don't care about cookies

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter, ABPindo, ABPVN List, Adblock List for Finland, AdBlockID, Bulgarian list, CJX's Annoyances List, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List, EasyList China, EasyList Czech and Slovak, EasyList Dutch, EasyList Germany, EasyList Hebrew, EasyList Italy, EasyList Lithuania, EasyList Polish, EasyList Portuguese, EasyList Spanish, EasyList Thailand, Estonian List, Frellwit's Swedish Filter, Greek AdBlock Filter, Hungarian filter, Icelandic ABP List, IndianList, KAD - Anti-Scam, Latvian List, List-KR, Liste AR, Liste FR, Macedonian adBlock Filters, Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard, Persian Blocker, Polish Annoyances Filters, Polish Anti Adblock Filters, Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement, Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters, Polish Social Filters, road-block light, ROList, ROLIST2, RU AdList - Counters, Xfiles, xinggsf, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. It still shows infinite loading for "checking site connection security" after the site repeated loading when adguard is on but when I disable it, the site connection settings loads and check itself and redirects me to the site. Re-enabling protection brings back the connection check issue.

2. infinite loading for "checking site connection security"-
![Screenshot_2023-10-26-09-16-49-133_com android chrome-edit](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/107706560/e0862097-545b-499c-9044-279250b3f871)

Same issue on https://apkmody.com-
![Screenshot_2023-10-26-09-24-28-317_com android chrome-edit](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/107706560/2c2ac759-626d-45e7-b429-d0051761d3d8)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: I also turned off https filtering on this site that also worked for me.

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.3 Nightly 18

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modyolo.com and https://apkmody.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://tikmate.app/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftikmate.app%2F) ### Comment > new problem from issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/165058 > > adblock was detected, and I tried disabling it then inserting any TikTok video link > and besides having an anti-adblock script, I was also forced to watch advertisements so I could download the video (this is like a reward system that must be obtained by watching the advertisement first) > > You can try inserting an example of this TikTok video link in the existing column: https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSND9xpHx/ Username: `@abidjauhar17` ### Screenshots

### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. issue.title: coveryourtracks.eff.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://coveryourtracks.eff.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcoveryourtracks.eff.org%2F) ### Comment > When the MetaMask extension is installed and active in Chrome, the coveryourtracks.eff.org test does not provide values for ‘Blocking tracking ads?’ and ‘Blocking invisible trackers?’. This problem does not occur when the MetaMask extension is disabled. It seems that issue 249, sent in 2015 (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardForAndroid/issues/249), is not working correctly today. > > To fix the issue, I disabled the following rules in “AdGuard Tracking Protection”: > ||eviltracker.net^$third-party > ||trackersimulator.org^$third-party > ||eviltracker.net^ > ||trackersimulator.org^ > > Then I added the following rules to “User rules” so that it works with my configuration: > ||trackersimulator.org^$stealth=referrer > ||eviltracker.net^$stealth=referrer > > Can you adjust AdGuard’s rules? comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
> They keep changing their main domains and creating new sites

some sites just increment the number in the domain name. If the domain is always new, and frequently replaced, the specific rules will be useless for such sites. I'm sure there exist other popular sites with similar content.
